name: Mr. Arif Hossain
subject: Mathematics
bio: Expert in Algebra and Calculus, Mr. Arif makes math fun and approachable.

name: Ms. Laila Rahman
subject: English Literature
bio: Her love for poetry and classic novels inspires every student she teaches.

name: Mr. Kamal Uddin
subject: Physics
bio: Known for his engaging experiments and clear explanations of physics laws.

name: Ms. Nusrat Jahan
subject: Biology
bio: Teaches biology with passion, making every class feel like a nature discovery.

name: Mr. Zahid Hasan
subject: History
bio: His storytelling brings ancient civilizations and historical events to life.

name: Ms. Farzana Alam
subject: Chemistry
bio: Specializes in Organic Chemistry and makes chemical reactions exciting.

name: Mr. Rezaul Karim
subject: Computer Science
bio: Loves coding and teaches students how to build websites and apps from scratch.

name: Ms. Tania Akter
subject: Geography
bio: Explores the world map and teaches about cultures and environments with passion.

name: Mr. Salman Ahmed
subject: Economics
bio: Breaks down complex economic theories into simple real-world examples.

name: Ms. Rima Chowdhury
subject: Bangla
bio: Brings the beauty of Bangla language and literature alive in her classroom.

name: Mr. Mahfuz Siddique
subject: Islamic Studies
bio: Guides students through the teachings of Islam with wisdom and compassion.

name: Ms. Shanta Rahim
subject: Art
bio: Encourages creativity and self-expression through painting and drawing.

name: Mr. Nayeem Hossain
subject: Physical Education
bio: Promotes fitness, teamwork, and discipline through fun activities and sports.

name: Ms. Mita Khatun
subject: Civics
bio: Teaches students about rights, responsibilities, and government structure.

name: Mr. Shoaib Akram
subject: Music
bio: Introduces students to classical and modern music, building rhythm and melody.
